attributes.action: Stop Lincolnshire Highways Dept wasting our money on "improving traffic problems in Grantham" which is just chaotic but to spend the money on a New East/West Bypass
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last few years Grantham has been thrown into chaos as a result of the Lincolnshire Highways changing the road system at a great expense to the tax payer and yet still not resolving the problem.
The only way to resolve the problem would be an East/West Bypass. Had the money already wasted been attributed to this in the first place the bypass which would have been very expensive  would now be well on its way to completion and resolving a long overdue problem once and for all.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop Lincolnshire Highways Dept wasting our money on "improving traffic problems in Grantham" which is just chaotic but to spend the money on a New East/West Bypass."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15012.asp

Prime Minister's Office
